title: Band, early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace, reticella style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Lace band in which ships alternate with mythical sea creatures. With attached border of stylized heart-shaped forms, taken from design by Parasole of 1597.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, early 17th century.
early 17th century. Medium: linen
